mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_board(qnaNum, memId, qnaPasswd, subject, content, readCnt, ref, ref_step, ref_level, qna_date, ip) VALUES(qna_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memId}, #{qnaPasswd}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, qna_seq.currval, #{ref_step}, #{ref_level}, #{qna_date}, #{ip})
